name: Antique Cover Fossil
effect:
Play this card as if it were a 60-HP Basic {C} Pokémon. This card can’t be affected by any Special Conditions and can’t retreat.
At any time during your turn, you may discard this card from play.
author: AYUMI ODASHIMA

abilities.name: Protective Cover
abilities.effect: Prevent all effects of attacks used by your opponent’s Pokémon done to this Pokémon. (Damage is not an effect.)
